item.title: Blues playlist for 9/2017
item.description: Including: Charlie Patton, Elmore James, Frank Stokes, Howlin' Wolf, Ron Davies, Roscoe Holcomb, That Black Snake Moan, The Marcus King Band, Tom And Jerry, You Can'T Beat The House.

item.title: Blues playlist for 8/2017
item.description: Including: Buddy Guy, Going Away Blues, Leslie Blake, Lightnin' Hopkins, Marcus King Band, R.L. Burnside And Family, Taj Mahal &Amp; Eric Bibb, Texas Flood, The Derek Trucks Band, The Motor City Is Burning.

item.title: Blues playlist for 7/2017
item.description: Including: B.B. King, Big Bill Broonzy, Derek Trucks Band, Fleetwood Mac, Hot Tuna, Isto, Jimi Hendrix, Muddy Waters, Susan Tedeschi, The Mississippi Sheiks.

item.title: Blues playlist for 6/2017
item.description: Including: Big Mama Thornton, Buddy Guy, Derek & The Dominos, Elton John And Joe Cocker, Gary B.B. Coleman, Lightnin' Hopkins, Robert Johnson, Solo Blues Guitar Lesson, Sonny Boy Williamson Ii, Townes Van Zandt.

item.title: Blues playlist for 5/2017
item.description: Including: Angelo Santelli, Bb King, Bob Dylan, Etta Baker, Gregg Allman, Howlin' Wolf, Lightnin' Hopkins, Pink Floyd, The Marcus King Band, Tom Waits.

item.description: Including: Amadou & Mariam, Bb King \ Eric Clapton, Bob Dylan, Burnside, Fleetwood Mac, Jimmie Rodgers, Kill It Kid, Led Zeppelin, Rory Gallagher, Samantha Fish.

item.description: Including: Dr. John & Eric Clapton, Eric Clapton, Freddie King, Gary Clark Jr, Howlin' Wolf, Jimmie Rodgers, Joe Bonamassa, Rory Gallagher, Samantha Fish, The Allman Brothers Band.

item.title: Blues playlist for 2/2017
item.description: Including: B.B. King, Bb King, Blues Jam In C, Buddy Guy, Eddie Hazel, Mississippi John Hurt, Muddy Waters, The Black Keys, Tom Waits, Zz Top.

item.title: Blues playlist for 1/2017
item.description: Including: Bo Diddley, Elmore James, Gary Clark Jr., Jerron "Blind Boy" Paxton, Junior Kimbrough, Lightnin' Hopkins, Stevie Ray Vaughan, Taj Mahal, The Allman Brothers Band, Vestapol.
